pages.title: Introduction
pages.text: Welcome to SkyBlock Create!$(br)A mod created by Snoeyz$(br2)The following pages will outline your journey through this modpack and help you understand how to achieve the ultimate automated skyblock island!

pages.title: That Was Easy!
pages.text: Congratulations! Simply by opening up this book, you're already well on your way to becoming a SkyBlock Create master!$(br)By earning this achevement, you should find in your inventory a $(item)pulverizer$(), a $(item)hand crank$(), and a $(item)wrench$()!
The $(item)pulverizer$() can be used to do various tasks, like break cobblestone, gravel, logs, and ice down!
The $(item)wrench$() can be used to rotate various contraptions, and by shift-clicking a contraption with the wrench, you can even pick contraptions up easily!
While, eventually, you'll be able to fully automate many tasks, for now, you'll have to use the $(item)hand crank$() to power many of the contraptions in the early stages.
Attach the hand crank to the input shaft of a contraption and power it by right-clicking on the crank.$(br)NOTE: Using the hand crank rapidly drains your hunger bar, so be careful not to starve!
